article:
Hiking is an activity of going out _ a long walk for pleasure.
People often go hiking in mountains. The activity is so popular that there are a large number of hikers throughout the world. Some hikers enjoy learning something from nature; some like to see different _  of trees, rocks and animals;  others  love this activity because it helps people release pressure   and stay _ .
People like hiking because _ two reasons. Hiking  doesn't cost  people much money. A good pair of hiking boot   and some _ clothes are enough. What's more, hiking suits people in any season and almost in any weather. Since we have known hiking is so helpful, let's  go  hiking this Sunday!
